item.title: Version 3.2.0
item.description:
Changes

  • Updated OpenVR to v1.23.7
  • Pose prediction has been rewritten resulting in improved motion smoothing
  • Allow games to recenter room-scale experiences
  • In-game recentering is no longer persistent
  • Implemented automatic HMD audio device selection
  • Decreased scrolling speed in Revive Dashboard
  • Added tray icon menu item to create a Revive Injector shortcut

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Golf+ doesn't launch correctly in headset (#1804)
  • Revive: Bonelab extreme stutters and low performance (#1788)
